abilities.title: Elven Adaptability
abilities.description: Elves are resourceful and creative, with good intelligence that allows them to adapt to various situations. This provides a +5% bonus to any two skills of the playerâ€™s choice, reflecting their versatility.

abilities.title: Keen Senses
abilities.description: The Elf Pathfinder has nightvision 60 ft (18.3 m) and a heightened awareness of their surroundings. This grants a +1 on initiative and a +5% bonus to detect concealment and detect ambush skills.

abilities.title: Psychic Potential
abilities.description: Elves exhibit a reasonably high percentage of psychic ability. Roll to determine psionics as per standard rules (e.g., a roll of 10-12 on 1D12 for minor psionics if using Palladium rules), reflecting their latent mental gifts.

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 on initiative, +1 to dodge, +2 to save vs horror factor.
